Item ID3107

Spiked boots are boots that can be obtained by bringing Dunstan (the Burthorpe blacksmith), an iron bar and a pair of climbing boots. Dunstan will only help after a player completes a required portion of the Death Plateau quest.

These boots are used during Desert Treasure while trying to obtain the Ice diamond on the Ice Path segment. The spiked boots are unequipable, except during portions of Death Plateau and Desert Treasure. They are not needed after the quest.

Trivia[edit | edit source]

  • Attempting to wear the boots outside of the Ice Path results in the message: Trying to walk in those would be difficult. I'll carry them for now.

[[File:Spiked boots detail.png|left|160px]]
'''Spiked boots''' are [[boots]] that can be obtained by bringing [[Dunstan]] (the [[Burthorpe]] blacksmith), an [[iron bar]] and a pair of [[climbing boots]]. Dunstan will only help after a player completes a required portion of the [[Death Plateau]] quest.

These boots are used during [[Desert Treasure]] while trying to obtain the [[Ice diamond]] on the [[Ice Path]] segment. The spiked boots are unequipable, except during portions of Death Plateau and Desert Treasure. They are not needed after the quest.
